attributes.title: made my phone glitch
attributes.review: downloaded this app to leave a bad review for the tik tok trend and it screwed up my phone. i had it downloaded for a day and my phone kept glitching. whatever app i was on would randomly close,  it ran super slow and glitching when i tried to type scroll swipe etc. i didn’t think it was the app until my friend who sent me the tik tok trend told me what it did to their phone, so i deleted it and now my phone is fine.

attributes.title: can i talk to the manager?
attributes.review: this is a disgusting app. the bugs in it were horrendous. the ads disturbing. i am utterly disgusted at what this app did to me and my five children all of them were possessed and stole them after they saw this app. and my pets. my pet dinosaur frog polar bear and rats were violently attacked after this app was randomly downloaded on my phone. i believe this is mind control by donald trump and his minions😡 i would never recommend this for anyone. they will be hearing from my lawyer😡😡🤮

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: For being our president he really does have the worst app to ever exist. After downloading it my whole phone started glitching and I couldn’t even get out of the app when I tried. This is a waste of time.

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: This may very well be the most poorly designed application ever created. It is slow, crashes and is not laid out in any way that resembles someone with even the slightest experience created it.

attributes.title: Stole my money
attributes.review: This app literally stole all my money and my moms money and my sisters money. It even stole my dog and foreclosed my home. Pls for whatever reason never download this app it is beyond haunted and taps into your phone and takes pictures of you while you sleep!!! 🖕🏻🖕🏻🖕🏻🙈🙈🙈🙈

attributes.title: review
attributes.review: this app is terrible! it keeps taking my money out of my account and says that i have to donate to trump fan bases! The app also notifies you that “nobody cares about your kids!” which i fone extremely offensive! Considering my son has down-syndrome!
